name: Folk Village Tour
description: If you have even wanted to take a trip back into the past, the Korean Folk Village will satisfy that need. The Seoul Korean Folk Village is one of the best places to help you understand what ancient times in the Hermit Kingdom were all about. A visit here helps you identify the local traditions that have stood the test of time.  The village contains old period houses, antique tools, art samples, examples of dated customs and folk performances common in traditional Korean lives.
